. Mind- Junior camps chose to nature exploration, promote problem solving and embrace logical thinking and creativity with special focus on building the ICT specializations such as Cyber Security, Embedded Systems, Digital Arts and Game Development in preparation for tomorrow’s jobs. Tech-LawThe Tech-Law Track is aimed at law graduates to keep up with technological developments and challenges

. It equips and empowers lawyers with a strong foundation in technology-related legal matters, to effectively navigate the evolving legal landscape in the digital era and provide valuable legal to clients operating in the technology sector. Egypt Makes Electronicsthe Egypt Makes Electronics (EME) Initiative

A presidential initiative aimed at boosting the electronics industry as a key driver of economic growth, under the supervision of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology. Role of the Information Technology Institute (ITI):
ITI provides specialized training in: Core Engineering Specializations: Embedded Systems, Cybersecurity, E-Mobility, Digital & Analog IC Design & Verification.

Supportive : LTE Networks Engineering, Software Testing, AI & Machine Learning, Industrial Automation, IoT Applications and Android Automotive. Mahara-TechMahara-Tech, an online platform by ITI (Information Technology Institute), offers high-quality tech training for Arabic speakers. It provides specialized courses in high-demand ICT fields, including cybersecurity, data analysis, programming (Java/Open Source/.Net), cloud computing, IoT, embedded systems, and quality assurance & testing
. The platform bridges the gap between technical skills and online job opportunities through: Freelancing market insights, presented by top Arabic experts.
Success stories of freelancers from diverse educational backgrounds.

Mahara-Tech serves as a comprehensive gateway for digital learning and career advancement in the tech industry. FreelancingFreelancingThe Work from Initiative, offered by the Information Technology Institute (ITI), is dedicated to empowering individuals to embrace freelancing and remote work opportunities. At the heart of our mission are four foundational pillars: Training, Mentorship, Inspiration, and Career, each designed to support you from the initial stages of your freelancing journey to long-term professional growth

. Military Training InitiativeThe Armed Forces Information Systems Department has signed a cooperation protocol with the Information Technology Institute (ITI), affiliated with the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology, to qualify conscripts for the labor market through partnerships with specialized companies in the field of information technology. This initiative is the first of its kind, offering a professional training scholarship that is counted within the conscription period

. The training duration ranges from 4 to 9 months as part of the institute’s training , aiming to equip conscripts with in-demand skills in the field of information technology. The Egyptian Tax Authority The ITI Talent SummitThe ITI Talent Summit is a premier event connecting industry needs with Egypt’s future tech professionals. Under the theme “Where Bright Minds Meet Future Opportunities” it brings together local and global organizations for collaboration, talent access, and knowledge exchange

. The Armed ForcesThe Armed Forces, in cooperation with the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology, organized a meeting for a number of conscripts in the Armed Forces who are graduates of engineering faculties (Computer Engineering specialization) and faculties of computer and information sciences. The meeting aimed to introduce the ITI (Information Technology Institute) initiative for training conscripts. ITI Tech-Law CeremonyDr

. ITI Tech-Law CeremonyDr. Amr Talaat, Minister of Communications and Information Technology, attended the graduation ceremony of the first cohort of the "ITI Tech-Law" program in Law and Technology. He also inaugurated the official launch of the program’s digital version on the Information Technology Institute’s online platform "MaharaTech". The event took place at the ITI headquarters in Smart Village, in line with the state’s efforts to build digital capacities across various societal segments and to promote the integration of modern technologies into different disciplines

. Professional Training Scholarships – (9 –month )The program offers a full scholarship to Egyptian university graduates within five years of graduation, aiming at bridge the skills gap between talent supply and market demands. It collaborates with industry partners to provide over 32 specialized tracks, selecting candidates through a rigorous process with a 10% acceptance rate. Delivered in a hybrid model, the program focuses on creating passionate, committed, and resilient leaders in the ICT sector

. Intensive Code Camps – (4 month)Intensive Code Camp (ICC) program provides a wide range of different tracks that are aligned with the Egyptian governorates’ local identity as well as the relative market needs such as Textile Design in Mahalla, 3D Furniture Design in Damietta, Solar Power in Siwa, Web Development for Tourism in Aswan, Digital Marketing and e-Content in Hurghada and many more. ICC is implemented in collaboration with the governorates training centers to capitalize on the existing infrastructure and reach out youth in rural areas

. Early Career Build Up (Summer Training)Developing human cadres and providing specialized consultation for individuals and entities in the ICT domain, ITI Early Career Build Up Program was initiated in 2019 as one of the most ambitious that inspires Egyptian youth to deepen their technological knowledge and shape their careers in the competitive ICT markets. Mahara-TechMahara-Tech, an online platform by ITI (Information Technology Institute), offers high-quality tech training for Arabic speakers. It provides specialized courses in high-demand ICT fields, including cybersecurity, data analysis, programming (Java/Open Source/.Net), cloud computing, IoT, embedded systems, and quality assurance & testing
. The platform bridges the gap between technical skills and online job opportunities through: Freelancing market insights, presented by top Arabic experts.

ITIITI In BriefThe Information Technology Institute (ITI) was established back in 1993 and became one of the MCIT’s affiliates in 2005. Its main mission revolves around ICT human capacity development. For over 30 years, ITI has kept updating its training portfolio through continuous monitoring of future global tech trends, as well as the country’s national and mega projects. As a result, it sustained an 85% employment percentage for its graduates

. ITI served thousands of Egyptian youth from different Egyptian governorates, who graduated from different academic backgrounds, thanks to the rich that built on their academic experience leveraging their future employment opportunities. These include development, content design, game development, Geographic Information System, media and animation, cloud, security, data analytics, among others

. ITI has a wide network of relations with industry and academia, empowering its curriculum and helping in reaching out talents in most of Egypt’s universities and governorates.missionSupporting Egyptian youth to improve their career opportunities by developing their skills and preparing them for highly in-demand jobs, and related vast technologies to fulfill today’s needs, and tomorrow’s forecast.visionA Reference Hub in Developing ICT Professional Talents.valuesPeople Develop Countries… We Develop PEOPLEpprofessionalismEElationoopennessppassionlloyaltyEExtra MileAffiliationThe MCIT strategy
MileAffiliationThe MCIT strategy is to develop the ICT infrastructure and industry, transforming Egypt into a global digital hub

. Information Technology Institute works to empower Egypt’s youth with the tools and skills needed to develop and live in a knowledge-based society, while using the ICT tools to boost the country’s competitiveness, productivity and the national, regional & international development.- Dr

. Amr Talaat, Minister of Communications and Information Technology -Chairperson's MessageBeing committed to develop highly skilled and well-trained cadres who are able to effectively contributing to our country’s development and with around 30 years in the field of ICT capacity development, ITI always keeps an eye on the accelerated market needs, engaging the industry key players and reflecting continuous changes on our designed . Thus, enabling ITI to scale up its reaching our more passionate learners all over Egypt.- Dr

:في معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات (ITI) نؤمن بدور المرأة كشريك أساسي في قيادة التحول الرقمي وصناعة المستقبل.
مشاركتنا في TechUp Women Summit ’25 تأتي استمرارًا لرحلتنا في تمكين الكوادر النسائية، ودعم مزيد من الفتيات والسيدات ليصبحن جاهزات لسوق العمل وقادرات على الابتكار في مجالات التكنولوجيا المختلفة.

في انتظاركم يوم السبت 8 نوفمبر 2025، في الجريك كامبس (The Greek Campus) بالقاهرة. إفريقياتقام المسابقة هذا العام تحت شعار "Spark Infinity"، وتنظم بالشراكة مع معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات (ITI) شركة هواوي تطلق النسخة السنوية من مسابقة هواوي كلاود للمطورين 2025 لمصر و شمال إفريقيا تقام المسابقة هذا العام تحت شعار "Spark Infinity"، وتنظم بالشراكة مع معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات (ITI) 10Oct2025فريق عمل مهارة تك يتقدم بالشكر إلى داعمي النجاح من اللجنة الوطنية المصرية للتربية والعلوم والثقافة لليونسكويؤكد ITI أن هذا التقدير الدولي هو حافز جديد للاستمرار في تطوير تجربة تعليمية رقمية بالذكاء الاصطناعي 10Oct2025فريق عمل مهارة تك يتقدم بالشكر إلى داعمي النجاح من اللجنة الوطنية المصرية

:يعلن معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات عن فتح باب التسجيل لمنحة برنامج التدريب المكثف بفروعه في المحافظات المختلفة ومراكز إبداع مصر الرقمية في تخصصات تكنولوجية متميزة لخريجي الجامعات المصرية من عام 2016 وحتى عام 2025. - لمعرفة المسارات المتاحة في كل فرع يرجى زيارة رابط التسجيل.
- المستندات المطلوبة ومراحل التسجيل موضحة برابط التسجيل.
- نظام الحضور بالدورات التدريبية هو نظام مختلط (Blended Learning).
- يبدأ التسجيل اعتباراً من يوم السبت الموافق 1 نوفمبر 2025، ويستمر حتى يوم الإثنين الموافق 10 نوفمبر 2025

. - يتم التسجيل من خلال الرابط التالي على الموقع الرسمي لمعهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات: NewsAll News Over 30 years, ITI has kept updating its training portfolio through continuous monitoring for the future global tech trends, as well as the country’s national and mega projects, hence; sustaining its graduates’ employment :يعلن معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات عن فتح باب التسجيل لمنحة برنامج التدريب المكثف بفروعه في المحافظات المختلفة ومراكز إبداع مصر الرقمية في تخصصات تكنولوجية متميزة لخريجي الجامعات المصرية من عام 2016 وحتى عام 2025. - لمعرفة المسارات المتاحة في كل فرع يرجى زيارة رابط التسجيل.

- المستندات المطلوبة ومراحل التسجيل موضحة برابط التسجيل.

- يبدأ التسجيل اعتباراً من يوم السبت الموافق 1 نوفمبر 2025، ويستمر حتى يوم الإثنين الموافق 10 نوفمبر 2025. - يتم التسجيل من خلال الرابط التالي على الموقع الرسمي لمعهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات: NewsAll NewsNext >NewsITI NewsOur Latest Newsفتح التسجيل ببرنامج التدريب المكثف بمعهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات01 November 2025Share :يعلن معهد تكنولوجيا المعلومات عن فتح باب التسجيل لمنحة برنامج التدريب المكثف بفروعه في المحافظات المختلفة ومراكز إبداع مصر الرقمية في تخصصات تكنولوجية متميزة لخريجي الجامعات المصرية من عام 2016 وحتى عام 2025. - لمعرفة المسارات المتاحة في كل فرع يرجى زيارة رابط التسجيل.

>Post Graduates ProgramsProfessional Training Program - (9 Months)Program DescriptionThis program offers a comprehensive scholarship for Egyptian university graduates who have completed their studies within the past five years. It serves as a catalyst to bridge the gap between the skills of talented graduates and the demands of the local, regional, and international job markets. Through collaboration with a diverse network of industry partners, we have designed over 32 different tracks to align with specific job profiles and ICT market competencies
. Candidates undergo a rigorous screening process and around 10% are accepted in this program, which spans over 9 months starting October every year

. Our strong industry connections enable us to achieve an employment rate of over 95%.feesFully Funded ScholarshipJob Profiles100+ ProfilesGraduates16k+ GraduatesDuration9 MonthsWho is eligible to applyGender :Males and FemalesNationality :EgyptianMilitary Service :Exempted or Deferred or Completed or Unknown or RequiredEducational Degree :Bachelor DegreeGraduation Year :Last 5 years of graduationGrade :FairPREVIOUSINTAKES Download Student GuideIntensive Code Camps - (ICC)Program DescriptionThe Intensive Code Camp (ICC) program provides a wide range of different tracks that are aligned with

range of different tracks that are aligned with the needs of the local, regional, and global markets in various fields of information technology, with a focus on specific job profiles with the aim of training for employment, such as: Web development with different technologies, Digital and Social Media Marketing, e-content development, E-learning, Cyber Security, System Administration, 2D Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Embedded Systems, Industrial Automation, Business Intelligence, UI/UX Design, and Software Testing.feesFully Funded ScholarshipJob Profiles100+ ProfilesGraduates15k

ScholarshipJob Profiles100+ ProfilesGraduates15k GraduatesDuration4 MonthsWho is eligible to applyGender :Males and FemalesNationality :EgyptianMilitary Service :Exempted or Deferred or CompletedEducational Degree :Bachelor DegreeGraduation Year :Last 10 years of graduationGrade :FairPREVIOUSINTAKES Download Student GuideMilitary Training Initiative - (Military)Program DescriptionThe Armed Forces Information Systems Department has signed a cooperation protocol with the Information Technology Institute (ITI), affiliated with the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology, to qualify
and Information Technology, to qualify conscripts for the labor market through partnerships with specialized companies in the field of information technology
. This initiative is the first of its kind, offering a professional training scholarship that is counted within the conscription period

. The training duration ranges from 4 to 9 months as part of the institute’s training , aiming to equip conscripts with in-demand skills in the field of information technology.feesFully Funded ScholarshipGraduates1k+ GraduatesDuration3 MonthsWho is eligible to applyGender :MalesNationality :EgyptianMilitary Service :All military statuses are allowed.Educational Degree :Bachelor DegreeGraduation Year :Last 10 years of graduationGraduation Year :At Least 1 years from graduationGrade :FairPREVIOUSINTAKES Download Student GuideEgypt Makes Electronics - (Egypt Makes Electronics)Program

Electronics - (Egypt Makes Electronics)Program Descriptionthe Egypt Makes Electronics (EME) InitiativeA presidential initiative aimed at boosting the electronics industry as a key driver of economic growth, under the supervision of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology.Role of the Information Technology Institute (ITI):ITI provides specialized training in:Core Engineering Specializations:Embedded Systems, Cybersecurity, E-Mobility, Digital & Analog IC Design & Verification.Supportive :LTE Networks Engineering, Software Testing, AI & Machine Learning, Industrial Automation,

AI & Machine Learning, Industrial Automation, IoT Applications and Android Automotive.Training Locations:Smart Village, New Administrative Capital, Creativa Center at Cairo University, Alexandria, Mansoura, Assiut, Menoufia, and summer training for students.Achievements:By the end of 2024,2,200 traineeswere trained, including1,200 graduatesand1,000 students, reinforcing sustainable development and positioning Egypt as a regional technology hub.feesFully Funded ScholarshipJob Profiles15 ProfilesGraduates2k+ GraduatesDuration4 MonthsWho is eligible to applyGender :Males and FemalesNationality

Training Program - (9 Months) Program Description This program offers a comprehensive scholarship for Egyptian university graduates who have completed their studies within the past five years

. It serves as a catalyst to bridge the gap between the skills of talented graduates and the demands of the local, regional, and international job markets. Through collaboration with a diverse network of industry partners, we have designed over 32 different tracks to align with specific job profiles and ICT market competencies. Candidates undergo a rigorous screening process and around 10% are accepted in this program, which spans over 9 months starting October every year. Our strong industry connections enable us to achieve an employment rate of over 95%

Through collaboration with a diverse network of industry partners, we have designed over 32 different tracks to align with specific job profiles and ICT market competencies

. Candidates undergo a rigorous screening process and around 10% are accepted in this program, which spans over 9 months starting October every year. Our strong industry connections enable us to achieve an employment rate of over 95%

. the Egypt Makes Electronics (EME) Initiative A presidential initiative aimed at boosting the electronics industry as a key driver of economic growth, under the supervision of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology. Role of the Information Technology Institute (ITI): ITI provides specialized training in: Core Engineering Specializations:Embedded Systems, Cybersecurity, E-Mobility, Digital & Analog IC Design & Verification. Supportive :LTE Networks Engineering, Software Testing, AI & Machine Learning, Industrial Automation, IoT Applications and Android Automotive

. Training Locations: Smart Village, New Administrative Capital, Creativa Center at Cairo University, Alexandria, Mansoura, Assiut, Menoufia, and summer training for students. Achievements: By the end of 2024,2,200 traineeswere trained, including1,200 graduatesand1,000 students, reinforcing sustainable development and positioning Egypt as a regional technology hub

We partner with Universities to create tech-camps sponsored and conducted with them in order to extend ITl's mission and to provide rapid and equal access to learning and knowledge transfer to massive population capacities through-out Egypt. In collaboration with the university, it has been agreed to design and conduct intensive training summer code-camps to undergraduates during their summer vacation to elevate their readiness to the market prior their graduation

. The design of the camps is guided by the growing demand for specific skills and technologies in the market to help the students find a job or internship in technologies like Android development, Open source development. IOT applications development, Cross platform mobile development, loS application development, Computer Networks, Ethical Hacking, Embedded systems, Robotics, GIS, Digital marketing, Furniture Design & Visualization, Architecture Design & visualization and Digital Arts

During this track Trainers will be provided with a solid understanding of the technology-related aspects relevant to their legal practice leveraging CS50 for Lawyers training program provided by Harvard University. They will also learn intellectual property rights in the digital age and advise clients on intellectual property matters in the technology sector. The track will conclude by exploring technology laws and regulations and addressing the local and international legal frameworks related to information technology

. Throughout the course, Trainers will be introduced to Freelancing skills and disruptive technologies to stay ahead of new dynamic ways of working and to provide tech-driven legal in an increasingly digital world.
Trainers will develop practical skills using practical exercises, case studies, and real-world examples to enhance their ability to apply their knowledge in practice

. IT for Law Practitioners - (Tech-Law) Program Description The Tech-Law Track is aimed at law graduates to keep up with technological developments and challenges

. It equips and empowers lawyers with a strong foundation in technology-related legal matters, to effectively navigate the evolving legal landscape in the digital era and provide valuable legal to clients operating in the technology sector.

During this track Trainers will be provided with a solid understanding of the technology-related aspects relevant to their legal practice leveraging CS50 for Lawyers training program provided by Harvard University. They will also learn intellectual property rights in the digital age and advise clients on intellectual property matters in the technology sector. The track will conclude by exploring technology laws and regulations and addressing the local and international legal frameworks related to information technology

. Throughout the course, Trainers will be introduced to Freelancing skills and disruptive technologies to stay ahead of new dynamic ways of working and to provide tech-driven legal in an increasingly digital world.

Trainers will develop practical skills using practical exercises, case studies, and real-world examples to enhance their ability to apply their knowledge in practice. This may involve analyzing technology contracts, drafting legal opinions on emerging technological issues, or providing legal advice on compliance with technology laws. The Tech-Law Track is aimed at law graduates to keep up with technological developments and challenges

. It equips and empowers lawyers with a strong foundation in technology-related legal matters, to effectively navigate the evolving legal landscape in the digital era and provide valuable legal to clients operating in the technology sector.

During this track Trainers will be provided with a solid understanding of the technology-related aspects relevant to their legal practice leveraging CS50 for Lawyers training program provided by Harvard University. They will also learn intellectual property rights in the digital age and advise clients on intellectual property matters in the technology sector. The track will conclude by exploring technology laws and regulations and addressing the local and international legal frameworks related to information technology

. Throughout the course, Trainers will be introduced to Freelancing skills and disruptive technologies to stay ahead of new dynamic ways of working and to provide tech-driven legal in an increasingly digital world.

Trainers will develop practical skills using practical exercises, case studies, and real-world examples to enhance their ability to apply their knowledge in practice. This may involve analyzing technology contracts, drafting legal opinions on emerging technological issues, or providing legal advice on compliance with technology laws

>Juniors ProgramsJunior Camps - (Junior Academy)Program DescriptionITI Junior Academy is a specialized training initiative designed for young individuals who are interested in exploring and developing their skills in various technical fields that Learning technology today is getting the skills required for the future and increasing opportunities in tomorrow's world. We empower junior to develop their computational and personal skills to match their talents and abilities, in a challenging environment that unleash their creativity

. The main objective of the ITI Junior Academy is to introduce to various tracks of technology and provide them with a solid foundation in technical knowledge. The program covers a wide range of topics, including Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, Embedded Systems, Digital Arts (2D Graphic Design,2D Animation) and Architecture Design. Through a combination of interactive sessions, practical exercises, and hands-on projects, participants gain a comprehensive understanding of these subjects

. This journey is structured to ensure a balance between theoretical learning and practical application. Participants learn key concepts and principles through engaging lectures and demonstrations, followed by opportunities to apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios

. This approach enables to grasp theoretical concepts while simultaneously honing their problem-solving and critical thinking skills.feesFully Funded ScholarshipGraduates2k GraduatesDuration2 WeeksWho is eligible to applyGender :Males and FemalesNationality :EgyptianMilitary Service :UnknownEducational Degree :All education degrees are allowed.Download Student GuideOver 30 years, ITI has kept updating its training portfolio through continuous monitoring for the future global tech trends, as well as the country’s national and mega projects, hence; sustaining its graduates’ employment >Juniors

trackTelco-Cloud engineering track focuses on next-gen wireless networks, blending cutting-edge AI/ML tools and cloud technologies in the telecom domain. The curriculum equips learners with cutting-edge skills in Cloud RAN (CRAN) and Open RAN (ORAN) technologies. Graduates will master 5G RAN deployment and automation, preparing them for roles in 5G network design, CRAN and ORAN engineering, and telco-cloud analytics

. trackThe Game Programming track trains individuals in game development, starting with basic common concepts and advancing to state-of-the-art engines. . trackThe 3D Generalist track encompasses a broad range of skills in (CGI). It involves expertise in modeling, texturing, rigging, animation, lighting, and rendering. A 3D Generalist is proficient in software like Autodesk Maya, 3ds Max, and Blender, and is capable of creating high-quality 3D assets for various industries including film, television, gaming, and advertising

. trackThis track focuses on teaching participants the principles of securing digital systems and networks from cyber threats. It covers topics such as network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, incident response, and risk management. Participants will gain hands-on experience in identifying vulnerabilities, implementing security measures, and mitigating risks

. The track emphasizes best practices for protecting data, ensuring privacy, and maintaining the integrity of information systems.Offered Job ProfilesThe following job profiles are available through the trackCyber Security OfficerCyber Incident ResponderPenetration Testerdownload Track infoOver 30 years, ITI has kept updating its training portfolio through continuous monitoring for the future global tech trends, as well as the country’s national and mega projects, hence; sustaining its graduates’ employment track This track focuses on teaching participants the principles of securing digital

trackThe GeoInformatic (GIS) track focuses on training individuals in the field of spatial data analysis and mapping. It covers topics such as GIS software, spatial databases, geospatial analysis, cartography, and remote sensing. Participants gain practical experience in manipulating and analyzing geographic data, creating maps, and utilizing GIS tools for decision-making and problem-solving

. The track emphasizes hands-on projects of industry-standard GIS techniques and tools.Offered Job ProfilesThe following job profiles are available through the trackGIS AnalystGIS Developerdownload Track infoOver 30 years, ITI has kept updating its training portfolio through continuous monitoring for the future global tech trends, as well as the country’s national and mega projects, hence; sustaining its graduates’ employment track The GeoInformatic (GIS) track focuses on training individuals in the field of spatial data analysis and mapping

trackThe ERP Consulting track involves providing expertise and guidance in implementing and improving Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems in organizations. It includes assessing enterprise needs, analyzing processes, and recommending suitable ERP system implementation and configuration. The track encompasses user training, documentation development, project monitoring, and change management

. trackThe AI and Machine Learning track provides a comprehensive understanding of AI and its applications. It covers concepts like supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing. Practical aspects include data preprocessing, model evaluation, and optimization. Participants gain hands-on experience and a solid foundation in AI principles

. trackIndustrial Automation Specialization is a product based program. You will gain essential knowledge in industrial automation field. Design, implement and validate your industrial solution will be your main objective. Different controller and monitoring systems as Programmable Logic Control (PLC), Human Machine Interface (HMI) and Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) will be delivered

. track3D Character Artists create 3D models of characters for films video games and Ads. Models are often based on original concept art. Character Artists create 3D characters, creatures, or objects that are integrated into live-action.

.
